EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_3_Solutions_Brochure
EmailTemplate.subject: A software package that can transform your network!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Enable new services simply and securely We know how important it is for the Head of Network Engineering to minimize security risks while increasing the performance and reliability of the network. Read our new solution brochure and discover how Nokia Secure Service Enablement from Nokia— which combines session border controllers (SBCs), diameter routing agents (DRAs) and authentication, authorization and accounting (AAA) as a set of software-based capabilities — can help you build and maintain your best network by:
- Strengthening security and performance - Attracting (and keeping) new customers - Bringing simplicity and agility to your operations Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
